snippet: Andy Murray, with his victory Monday at the U.S. Open, has joined the rarefied company of Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic at the top of men’s tennis.
abstract: Andy Murray, with his victory at the US Open, joins the rarefied company of Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic at the top of men’s tennis.
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray, with his victory Monday at the U.S. Open, has joined the rarefied company of Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic at the top of men’s tennis.

headline.seo: With Grand Slam Title, Murray Joins Tennis’ Elite
headline.main: Murray Elbows His Way Into Exclusive Men’s Club
headline.print_headline: Murray Takes His Turn at Rising Over Rivals
